name: Low Detail Mode
description: Removes the checkerboard and color changing background

name: Disable Selection Box Flash
description: If for some reason you hate selection box flashing itself

name: Enable Confirm Entrance
description: Enables a confirm window when pressing the [Tab] key

name: BG Checkerboard Color:
description: Changes the checkerboard background color hue

name: BG Checkerboard Alpha:
description: Changes the checkerboard background opacity value

name: BG Color Start:
description: Changes the background color hue from the starting point

name: BG Color End:
description: Changes the background color hue from the ending point
